show_name: Daily Lives of High School Boys (TV)
plot: The lives of a group of students who attend the boys-only Sanada North High School and their acquaintances. Generally centered around three friends; Tadakuni, Yoshitake, and Hidenori; they are surrounded by odd classmates, peculiar family members, and many other unique individuals.
ending_theme: "Ohisama" (おひさま) by Amesaki Annainin (雨先案内人) (eps 2-)
